name.failure.description: The failure status of the task

name.failureReason.description: The reason for the task's failure

name.traceId.description: The trace ID of the task

name.createdAt.description: The date and time the Sora video was generated

name.startEndImage.description: Label for start/end frame reference images (keep short)

name.model.description: The model version used to generate the video

name.soraBot.description: The name of the Sora video generator

name.orientation.description: The name of the video orientation parameter

option.portrait.description: Option label for portrait orientation (keep short)

option.landscape.description: Option label for landscape orientation (keep short)

name.duration.description: The name of the video duration parameter

name.size.description: The name of the video quality parameter

description.imageUrl.message: In multi-image video creation tasks, multiple images must be uploaded.

description.prompt.message: Prompt words for generating Sora videos

description.uploadStartEndImage.message: Array of reference image links, the first is the start frame, followed by the end frame image

status.pending.description: The waiting status of the task

status.processing.description: The processing status of the task

placeholder.select.description: Placeholder text in the selection field

placeholder.prompt.message: Enter prompt words for the video style to be generated, e.g., moving
placeholder.prompt.description: Placeholder text in the prompt field

tip.proOnly.message: Only the sora-2-pro model supports modifying this parameter
tip.proOnly.description: Tip to inform users that only the professional model supports modifying this parameter

button.generate.description: Button text for generating Sora videos

button.action1.description: Button text for generating Sora videos

button.action2.description: Button text for generating Sora videos

button.download.description: Button text for downloading the video

button.uploadImageUrl.description: Button text for uploading images (keep short: Upload)

button.uploadReferences.description: Button text that allows users to upload references

message.uploadReferencesExceed.message: You can upload a maximum of 2 images
message.uploadReferencesExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded images exceeds the limit

message.uploadReferencesSuccess.description: Success message when images are uploaded successfully

message.uploadReferencesError.message: Image upload failed, please try again later
message.uploadReferencesError.description: Error message when image upload fails

message.startingTask.description: Message when the drawing task starts

message.startTaskSuccess.description: Success message when the task is successfully started

message.startTaskFailed.message: Failed to initiate task, please contact the administrator
message.startTaskFailed.description: Error message when starting the drawing task fails

message.usedUp.message: Your credits are exhausted, please purchase more credits to continue using

message.generating.description: Message when the image is being generated

message.downloadVideo.description: Message when the image is being generated

message.uploadVideoExceed.message: The number of uploaded start frame images exceeds the limit
message.uploadVideoExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded start frame images exceeds the limit

message.uploadVideoSizeExceed.description: Error message when the uploaded file size exceeds 10MB!

message.uploadVideoTypeFailed.message: Uploaded file must be in MP4 format!
message.uploadVideoTypeFailed.description: Error message when the uploaded file must be in MP4 format!

message.uploadStartEndImageExceed.message: The number of uploaded first frame images exceeds the limit
message.uploadStartEndImageExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded first frame images exceeds the limit

message.uploadEndImageExceed.message: The number of uploaded end frame images exceeds the limit
message.uploadEndImageExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded end frame images exceeds the limit

message.uploadStartImageError.message: Failed to upload the start frame image
message.uploadStartImageError.description: Error message when the upload of the start frame image fails

message.uploadVideoError.description: Error message when the upload of the video fails

message.uploadEndImageError.message: Failed to upload the end frame image
message.uploadEndImageError.description: Error message when the upload of the end frame image fails

message.uploadDocumentsError.description: Error message when the upload of the document fails

message.noOperations.description: Message when there are no available operations

message.noTasks.message: No historical tasks, please click on the left to generate a video
message.noTasks.description: Message when there are no tasks
